title: Behind The Idea #92: Finding The Range For Range Resources
description: Not that price is truth, but the price chart for Range Resources over the past five years is really ugly. But the company has long been a favorite of Seeking Alpha authors. We try to pick apart this bearish market consensus vs. bullish author sentiment with an idea from KCI Research Ltd. on the company and why its valuation is too cheap to ignore.
itunes:title: Finding The Range For Range Resources
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: We go back to the natural gas patch to discuss a crowded contrarian play.
